titleStmt.title: Nugæ venales, sive, Thesaurus ridendi & jocandi Ad gravissimos severissimosque viros, patres melancholicorum conscriptos opus plane novum & necessarium; in quo quid contineator, quævis pagina docebit.

publicationStmt.publisher: Anno 1642. Prostant apud neminem; sed tamen ubique,

notesStmt.note: Theses de hasione et hasibili qualitate, Themata medica, and Theses inaugurales quas ex Senatus have a separate divisional title pages.
Crepundia poëtica somniata and Pugna porcorum each have separate dated title pages, separate pagination and separate registers.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
